fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.util

Interface LocatedDeviceTrackerCustomizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocatedDeviceManager, LocatedDeviceTracker

    public interface LocatedDeviceTrackerCustomizer
    Device Tracker Customizer.
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addedDevice(LocatedDevice device)
      A device tracked by the Tracker object has been added in the list.
      boolean addingDevice(LocatedDevice device)
      A device is being added to the Tracker object.
      void modifiedDevice(LocatedDevice device, String propertyName, Object oldValue, Object newValue)
      Called when a device tracked by the Tracker object has been modified.
      void movedDevice(LocatedDevice device, Position oldPosition, Position newPosition) 
      void removedDevice(LocatedDevice device)
      A device tracked by the Tracker object has been removed.

    • Method Detail

      • addingDevice

        boolean addingDevice(LocatedDevice device)
        A device is being added to the Tracker object. This method is called before a device which matched the search parameters of the Tracker object is added to it. This method must return true to be tracked for this device object.
        Parameters:
        device - the device being added to the Tracker object.
        Returns:
        The service object to be tracked for the DeviceReference object or null if the DeviceReference object should not be tracked.

      • addedDevice

        void addedDevice(LocatedDevice device)
        A device tracked by the Tracker object has been added in the list. This method is called when a device has been added in the managed list (after addingDevice) and if the device has not disappeared before during the callback.
        Parameters:
        device - the added device

      • modifiedDevice

        void modifiedDevice(LocatedDevice device,
                  String propertyName,
                  Object oldValue,
                  Object newValue)
        Called when a device tracked by the Tracker object has been modified. A tracked device is considered modified according to tracker configuration.
        Parameters:
        device - the changed device
        propertyName - name of the property that has changed
        oldValue - previous value of the property
        newValue - new value of the property

      • movedDevice

        void movedDevice(LocatedDevice device,
               Position oldPosition,
               Position newPosition)

      • removedDevice

        void removedDevice(LocatedDevice device)
        A device tracked by the Tracker object has been removed. This method is called after a device is no longer being tracked by the Tracker object.
        Parameters:
        device - the removed device.
